property.name: DOWNSAMPLE
property.shortdesc: Averages the pixels in a sample area and replaces the entire area with the average pixel color.

property.name: SUBSAMPLE
property.shortdesc: Chooses a pixel in the center of the sample area and replaces the entire area with that pixel color.

property.name: BICUBIC_DOWNSAMPLE
property.shortdesc: Uses a weighted average to determine pixel color.
